tech_news.title: SpaceX issues statement on Starship V3 Booster 18 anomaly - Teslarati
tech_news.description: The incident unfolded during gas-system pressure testing at the company’s Massey facility in Starbase, Texas.

tech_news.title: Google denies ‘misleading’ reports of Gmail using your emails to train AI - The Verge
tech_news.description: Google is pushing back on posts claiming it has changed its policy to use your Gmail messages and attachments to train AI models, telling The Verge that it does not train Gmail content for training Gemini.

tech_news.title: Return to the year 2000 with classic multiplayer DOS games in your browser - Ars Technica

tech_news.title: Fallout 4 Gets New Update Following Anniversary Edition Backlash - GameSpot
tech_news.description: The Wasteland needs some help getting back on its feet after the fallout from the Anniversary edition of Fallout 4.

tech_news.title: Google Adds Gemini AI-Assistant to Android Auto - Gizmodo
tech_news.description: Gemini is spreading its tendrils to millions of additional vehicles.

tech_news.title: Apple TV Streaming Service Drops Price 54% in Black Friday Deal - Variety
tech_news.description: Apple on Friday introduced a new limited-time offer: New and returning Apple TV subscribers can sign up to get six months of the streaming service for $5.99 per month -- 54% off the regular price.

tech_news.title: Early Black Friday Deals: Best Buy Has Upped Their Game, and So Has Amazon - IGN
tech_news.description: Best Buy and Amazon unleash massive Early Black Friday 2025 deals, including huge savings on gaming PCs, consoles, controllers, 3D printers, collectibles, handhelds, GPUs, and more.

tech_news.title: AirPods Pro 3 and AirPods 4 drop to their best prices yet for Black Friday Week [Updated] - 9to5Mac

tech_news.title: Google continues to test ads in AI Mode results (update) (GOOGL:NASDAQ) - Seeking Alpha
tech_news.description: Google (GOOG) (GOOGL) has started rolling out ads in AI mode for the first time ever. The company is now showing ads at the bottom of the results in AI Mode.
